name: BLACK BOX LSS - The Shining Immortal
name_original: BLACK BOX LSS - The Shining Immortal
description:
❤ Game Overview ❤
Immerse yourself in a heart-pounding, romantic visual novel where you play the role of a new recruit, just a month into your job, pursuing your female boss. Set against the backdrop of a futuristic sci-fi world, this short narrative is part of a vast universe. Beautifully illustrated in pixel art, and a riveting soundtrack that sets the mood for this love story. The game's rich dialogue and introspective monologues are presented in a simple and easily understood manner.
❤ Key Features ❤
If you're a fan of an immersive atmosphere, heterosexuality, romance with younger man, and yandere characters, with an added sprinkle of crime and suspense, this game is a perfect fit for you.
❤ Gameplay ❤
Being a visual novel, you will only need to make some decisions occasionally, with no extra controls to worry about. Bad endings will be breezed over, bringing you back to the previous branching point. No need to stress about save points (although it's still advisable to save at decision junctures to revisit different story paths more easily).
❤ Controls ❤
The game utilizes simple controls:
Mouse Clicks for selection,
Arrow Keys for cursor movement,
Space bar or Enter Key for confirmation.
❤ Estimated Playtime ❤
The length of gameplay varies based on each player's reading pace. Generally, it ranges from 40 minutes to an hour. A game streaming may take about 2 hours.
